name: FetchTicketDetails
description:
Retrieve details of a FreshService ticket using its ID.

Use this tool to obtain detailed information about a specific ticket in FreshService by providing the ticket ID.

parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.description: ID of the Freshservice ticket to be retrieved.

value_schema.description: ID of the ticket to be fetched

parameters.name: include_fields_in_ticket_response
parameters.description: Specify fields to include in the ticket response, such as 'stats', 'requester', 'conversations', etc.

value_schema.description: Query param to include certain fields in response. E.g. '?include=stats' Will return the ticket’s closed_at, resolved_at and first_responded_at time. '?include=requester' Will return the requester's email, id, mobile, name, and phone. Supported options - [conversations, requester, problem, stats, assets, change, related_tickets]

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Query param to include certain fields in response. E.g. '?include=stats' Will return the ticket’s closed_at, resolved_at and first_responded_at time. '?include=requester' Will return the requester's email, id, mobile, name, and phone. Supported options - [conversations, requester, problem, stats, assets, change, related_tickets]

value_schema.description: Query param to include certain fields in response. E.g. '?include=stats' Will return the ticket’s closed_at, resolved_at and first_responded_at time. '?include=requester' Will return the requester's email, id, mobile, name, and phone. Supported options - [conversations, requester, problem, stats, assets, change, related_tickets]

parameters.description: ID of the ticket to be fetched

value_schema.description: ID of the ticket to be fetched
